name: UNIV2SHRIMPPool
description: UNIV2SHRIMPPool. Audit certificate : Pending. Inherits the BasePool contract, and contains reward distribution logic for the $HRIMP token.

eventDecorators.name: RewardClaimed
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: Staked
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: Unstaked
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Displays LP Token staked per account.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 : total LP staked by given account address.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: Transfers earnings from previous epochs to the caller.

functionDecorators.name: currentEpoch
functionDecorators.description: Calculates current epoch value from the block timestamp. Calculates the nth 8-hour window frame since the heartbeat's start time.

functionDecorators.name: earned
functionDecorators.description: Displays earnings of an address so far. Useful to display claimable rewards on the frontend.

functionDecorators.name: epochEndTimeFromTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Displays timestamp when a given epoch will end.

functionDecorators.name: epochFromTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Displays the epoch which contains the given timestamp.

functionDecorators.name: epochStartTimeFromTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Displays timestamp when a given epoch began.

functionDecorators.name: rewardPerStake
functionDecorators.description: Displays reward tokens per Lp token staked. Useful to display APY on the frontend.

functionDecorators.name: rewardRate
functionDecorators.description: Displays total $HRIMP rewards distributed per second in a given epoch. Series 1 : Epochs : 1-84 Total $HRIMP distributed : 12 M Distribution duration : 28 days Series 2 : Epochs : 85-337 Total $HRIMP distributed : 21.6 M Distribution duration : 84 days Series 3 : Epochs : 337-589 Total $HRIMP distributed : 10.8 M Distribution duration : 84 days Series 4 : Epochs : 589-841 Total $HRIMP distributed : 5.4 M Distribution duration : 84 days Series 5 : Epochs : 841-1093 Total $HRIMP distributed : 2.7 M Distribution duration : 84 days Series 6 : Epochs : 1094+ Total $HRIMP distributed : 1.35 M Distribution duration : Forever, at 84 day intervals.

returnDecorators.description: $HRIMP Tokens distributed per second during the given epoch.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Stake / Deposit LP Token into the Pool. Increases count of total LP Token staked in the current epoch. Increases count of LP Token staked for the caller in the current epoch. Register that caller last staked in the current epoch. Perform actions from BasePool.stake().

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: : Amount of LP Token to stake.

functionDecorators.name: totalSupply
functionDecorators.description: Displays the total LP Token staked.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 : value of the _totalSupply which stores total LP Tokens staked.

functionDecorators.name: unstake
functionDecorators.description: Unstake / Withdraw staked LP Token from the Pool. : Decreases count of total LP Token staked Decreases count of LP Token staked for the msg.sender LP Token is transferred from the Pool to the msg.sender.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: : Amount of LP Token to withdraw / unstake.

functionDecorators.name: unstakeAndClaim
functionDecorators.description: Unstake the staked LP Token and claim corresponding earnings from the Pool. : Perform actions from unstake() Perform actions from claim().
